review: Love my Friends Stick!! I have two of them and I have zero complaints.
author: Angela Caulk

review: 2nd one we purchased -- one for home and one for our vacation home.  Love the Fire Stick with Amazon Prime!
author: Pilow

review: My tv only has one HDMI port. Unable to capture TV audio. Called customer service to get help getting audio from TV for Fire Stick and tech said I needed second HDMI port with infrared receiver? Really?
author: Craig McNey

review: So awesome having so much streaming capabilities at my fingertips
author: Dee

review: Love it exept alot pf yimes it dont want to connect to wifi. Weak pitcure.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love this device. It make watching TV so much nicer!
author: Cassie Asako

review: Product is okay. Exactly as advertised.
author: Dean
